alert.note: Alert for Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:22PM PST until January 13 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM FRIDAY TO 10 PM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches in valleys and 6 to 10 inches in higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Humboldt County and Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County. * WHEN...From 10 PM Friday to 10 PM PST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Humboldt County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County
